name: Motor Skills & Movement
description: Demonstrates competency in motor skills and movement patterns needed to perform physical activities

name: Movement Concepts
description: Applies knowledge of concepts, principles, strategies and tactics related to movement

name: Physical Activity & Fitness
description: Participates regularly in physical activity and achieves/maintains health-enhancing fitness

name: Responsible Behavior
description: Exhibits responsible personal and social behavior that respects self and others

name: Value of Activity
description: Recognizes the value of physical activity for health, enjoyment, challenge, and expression

name: Fitness Knowledge
description: Demonstrates understanding of fitness concepts, principles, and strategies

name: Social Interaction
description: Develops social skills through movement and physical activity participation
